name: Stick Fighter (ARF Game Studio)
description:
Stick Fighter is a two button fighter that lets you jump straight into the action!

Take control of one out of 6 unique stick fighters and find out who would be best in a stickman fight! 

Currently has no online play but our community plays through parsec, you can find us and them in our discord: https://discord.gg/ATDx3E2STg
